llm_res.rule: transferFrom: Transfers _value amount of tokens from address _from to address _to, and MUST fire the Transfer event.
transfer: Transfers _value amount of tokens to address _to, and MUST fire the Transfer event. The function SHOULD throw if the message caller’s account balance does not have enough tokens to spend.

transferFrom: Transfers _value amount of tokens from address _from to address _to, and MUST fire the Transfer event. The function SHOULD throw unless the _from account has deliberately authorized the sender of the message via some mechanism.
llm_res.function: execute(address uniswapPool, address[] memory recipients, uint256 tokenAmounts, uint256 wethAmounts)

llm_res.rule: approve: Allows _spender to withdraw from your account multiple times, up to the _value amount. If this function is called again it overwrites the current allowance with _value.
name: Returns the name of the token - e.g. 'MyToken'.
symbol: Returns the symbol of the token. E.g. 'HIX'.
